title: Infographics
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062541im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-3_3983.jpg)
  
What font is used on this infographics from lenta.ru about Eurotunnel?  
P.S. There's only numbers and cyrillic symbols on the picture  
 [http://icdn.lenta.ru/images/2014/05/06/16/20140506165933005/original\_81a...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062541/http:/icdn.lenta.ru/images/2014/05/06/16/20140506165933005/original_81ad9ceed3b09242d3cc1174d840ed0b.jpg "http://icdn.lenta.ru/images/2014/05/06/16/20140506165933005/original\_81ad9ceed3b09242d3cc1174d840ed0b.jpg")

Font: 

 Roboto

comments.content: Christian Robertson's [Roboto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062541/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/roboto) (Condensed Bold to be precise), the Google font.
